name: DeployTestAgent
description: Deploy and configure Test Agent to run tests on a lab environment
author: Microsoft Corporation

inputs.name: environment
inputs.label: Environment
inputs.helpMarkDown: The name of environment on which tests need to be run.

inputs.name: testMachines
inputs.label: Deploy to machines
inputs.helpMarkDown: Comma separeted list of machines where test agent needs to be deployed. For example: 'Machine1,Machine2,Machine3'

inputs.name: runAsProcess
inputs.label: Run Test Agent as interactive process to execute UI Tests
inputs.helpMarkDown: Denotes if test agent needs to run as interactive process.

inputs.name: machineUserName
inputs.label: Username
inputs.helpMarkDown: The username with which test agent process needs to run.

inputs.name: machinePassword
inputs.label: Password
inputs.helpMarkDown: The password for the username given above.

inputs.name: subHeading
inputs.label: Alternate Credentials to publish test results, only required if connecting to Visual Studio Online

inputs.name: alternateCredsUserName
inputs.label: Alternate credentials Username
inputs.helpMarkDown: Alternate Credentials Username, only required if connecting to Visual Studio Online

inputs.name: alternateCredsPassword
inputs.label: Alternate credentials Password
inputs.helpMarkDown: Alternate Credentials Password, only required if connecting to Visual Studio Online

inputs.name: agentLocation
inputs.label: Test Agent Location
inputs.helpMarkDown: Optionally supply the path to TestAgent.zip from network or local location.If no path is provided, it will be downloaded from http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=528474&clcid=0x409
